mapper.sql: t_bas_annual.ANNUAL_ID AS "annualId", t_bas_annual.TITLE AS "title", t_bas_annual.SIMPLE_TITLE AS "simpleTitle", t_bas_annual.IS_ENROLL AS "isEnroll", t_bas_annual.CREATE_USER_ID AS "createUserId", t_bas_annual.CREATE_USER_NAME AS "createUserName", t_bas_annual.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", t_bas_annual.UPDATE_USER_ID AS "updateUserId", t_bas_annual.UPDATE_USER_NAME AS "updateUserName", t_bas_annual.UPDATE_TIME AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bas_annual( ANNUAL_ID, TITLE, SIMPLE_TITLE, IS_ENROLL, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{annualId}, #{title}, #{simpleTitle}, #{isEnroll}, #{createUserId}, #{createUserName}, #{createTime}, #{updateUserId}, #{updateUserName}, #{updateTime} )

INSERT INTO t_bas_annual( ANNUAL_ID, TITLE, SIMPLE_TITLE, IS_ENROLL, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES
( #{annual.annualId}, #{annual.title}, #{annual.simpleTitle}, #{annual.isEnroll}, #{annual.createUserId}, #{annual.createUserName}, #{annual.createTime}, #{annual.updateUserId}, #{annual.updateUserName}, #{annual.updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_bas_annual SET ANNUAL_ID = #{annualId}, TITLE = #{title}, SIMPLE_TITLE = #{simpleTitle}, IS_ENROLL = #{isEnroll}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId}, CREATE_USER_NAME = #{createUserName}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId}, UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{updateUserName}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime} WHERE ANNUAL_ID = #{annualId}
